title: Meet your 2016 All-Stars!
body: Edit: This article has been updated to accurately reflect the correct Team Fire and Team Ice rosters. Team Fire is LCK, NA LCS, and IWC. Team Ice is EU LCS, LMS, and LPL

replies.body: why would anyone vote for the ugly bengi instead of peanut {{champion:83}}
Maybe because bengi has 3x more world titles than peanut? just a guess{{champion:64}} {{champion:60}} (fill in 3rd champion with SKT bengi skin here)

uhhhh 3 x 0 = 0
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Maybe because people care more about clutch plays more than physical appearance?
I'd agree with you, but people voted for sexpeke in eu, so...
sexpeke is the exception
Faker confirmed South Korea's secret weapon?
secret? SECRET? what secret? Faker IS koreas weapon and EVERYBODY knows it!!!

very secret where did he come from who is faker what is secret?
Sir let me google "secret" for you :D
https://lmgtfy.com/?q=secret
Where is Imaqtpie?
Sorry, only good players were included in voting (kek)

WTF DID YOU SAY ABOUT MY QT?!!?!?!?!
XD
WHERE TF IS DARSHAN! {{champion:157}}
WHO TF WOULD VOTE FOR DARSHAN in a region that has impact and huni
Impact>Darshan
ikr where is darshan
I don't know where you live, but here, a big truck comes every week to take away the garbage.
"Are they Rush Hour or Rush Hour 3?" Holy crap that one killed me.
Yellowstar y u do dis? {{item:3070}}
is it just me or is team fire way more stacked?
Aside from Jankos that EU team looks pretty weak. I think that Fire is the clear favorites here.

KR>China NA>EU LMS>IWC 


As for NA>EU:"NA is the butt of many memes, but they actually had the second highest win percentage at Worlds 2016 -- after Korea."
Except that in a couple of years, all people will remember is that apart from season 1 (which doesn't really count) NA has never made it to the semis whereas EU has made it 4 out of 5 times.
NA just can't play on big stages lol. But I think that the NA team this year is so overly stacked... I'm very excited. 750/750 {{item:3070}}
any team that have koreans is always more stacked
because the LCK is the Lebron of League.  Whichever side has them will always seem more stacked.
hasn't Korea won the last 4 worlds not 3?{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
skt,ssw,skt,skt thats 4
It is talking about SKT world wins not Korean, I mean they are 3/4 of Korean and 1/2(arguably 3/5) world wins so I see why you were confused.

Just pointing out the fact that it says the 5 players from the IWC Wild Card Event will round out Team Ice instead of Fire...  

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
More players to balance out the scale vs the KR team
I spent too long trying to figure out how to vote for insec
Team fire is so stacked, we have NA, LCK, and wildcard, while team ice has LMS, LPL, and wildcard
Wildcard will actually be on Team Ice.
I'm pretty sure he's making a joke about EU...
Doublelift and Aphromoo lmao {{champion:67}} {{champion:432}}
lol look at fakers percentage{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Wtf EU
I will be highly disappointed if Likkrit is not the support from the IWC.

He isn't even at IWC AS...Edward of Moscow Five fame is there and Kira and Smurf are the ANL players. 

There is no god. {{champion:63}}
G2 on vacation lul
I loved watching Doublelift last year in this event, but I think it is strange to vote in someone who is taking a hiatus. Would rather see a player who is going to continue playing in the next split.
They voted in YellowStar who full on retired (Even though he declined...)
Dyrus showed up at this event last year, didn't he?

lol.... sad... there's so many things wrong with the All-Star Roster it's mildly frustrating. First of all I'm all about SKT, but even I'm shocked that Bengi won over Peanut. How did that happen? Bengi barely played (Aside from the insanely clutch matches in the Semi/Finals) and then we have MADLIFE coming in at the support role.... LOL... like who voted for him? His team got relegated at the end of the Summer Split... literally the only reasons why he is going is only because his name is probably the only Support Champion in the LCK that NA fans recognize.... and now my biggest complaint would be Pray winning over Bang in the ADC position. Once again... Pray is NOT as good of an ADC as Bang... Bang has proved countless times through insane Solo Kills that Pray just doesn't have what it takes... again NA fans literally just voted for Pray because of that stupid Ashe Arrow that was popularized at worlds... First of all it was Bang who started the Ashe Meta at worlds in case people forgot.. LOL Mouse winning over Marin as well in the LPL... but I don't really care that much tbh.....  I get that it's supposed to be all in fun and what not... and I'm sure it will be...but it sucks when pros that deserve to attend aren't going...

lol Pray is a god. You should see this season's LCK Spring and Summer ROX vs SKT matches. In Korea, we believe Bang, Pray, Deft, Imp are all same level top adcs in the world. I think the reason he got picked is due to his streaming. He is funny and has lot of fans in Korea. 
Also, Bengi getting picked over peanut is no surprise. Bengi is much more popular than peanut in Korea. I'm pretty sure majority of Korean votes went to "Beng the jungle god gi" or the "Beng the rift god gi" 

But seriously Mouse over Marin and Looper? Mouse must be so popular in China to get picked over former world champions
ppl just forget too fast, i was hoping to see Marin again but o well {{champion:32}}
looper cant go because only 2 players from the same team are allowed, Mata and Uzi are already on the team
